item.title: Blog: HEIR as a Platform for Research (and new YouTube Channel)
item.description:
On 2024-12-05, the HEIR team presented a talk aimed at giving researchers a high-level overview of the HEIR project, brainstorming where new research might be needed, and discussing how the HEIR team could help with research projects.

The video recording of this talk is on YouTube, and this is the first video posted on the new HEIR YouTube channel.
